description:
The Odd Jobs are having breakfast in the living room, though the only one gorging on egg over rice is Kagura. Turns out ever since Kagura was put in charge of cooking, it’s been egg over rice nonstop. After getting complaints from Gintoki, Kagura goes to Shinpachi’s house to vent her frustration. Otae then invites Kagura to come to a cooking class with her. The class is filled with girls wearing aprons, but amongst them are some odd faces!
Source: crunchyroll
